name: County Hospital
description:
County Hospital is a singleplayer offline psychological horror inmersive game. Paranormal activity is happening, gather as much evidence as you can. Play as a young female investigator who is looking for proofs of human experiments in an old abandoned hospital. Through the eyes of "Kelia", you'll be taken through a nightmare, enter to the County Hospital and find all the keys to scape, this place is doom, so you must search and collect evidence and face some terrors.

Kelia is a detective, as a side thing he's been trying to keep track of remaining Nazi officers spread around the world. The abandoned hospital seems to be one of the clues, are you brave enough to play with your friends?


Key Features
  • Very high AAA quality assets
  • Original soundtracks and music
  • Complex inventory system
  • Jumpscares that will kill your sleep
  • Super inmersive Terrifying atmosphere
  • Creepy history
  • Perfect for a rainy day with friends
